title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not trigger any action or produce any noticeable result.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu should trigger an action to add Javadoc on the field in TH.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu. 4. Observe that nothing happens.
